io.scanbot.sdk.ui.utils.navigator

Class Nodes.FunctionalNode<A extends Activity>

  • io.scanbot.sdk.ui.utils.navigator.Nodes.FunctionalNode<A>
  • Enclosing class:
    Nodes

    public static class Nodes.FunctionalNode<A extends Activity>

    Navigation node which delegates each method to a dedicated function.

    • Field Detail

      • Companion

        public static io.scanbot.sdk.ui.utils.navigator.Nodes.FunctionalNode.Companion Companion

    • Method Detail

      • navigateTo

        public void navigateTo(@NotNull
                       A activity,
                       @NotNull
                       java.lang.Object data)

        Called when this node is on the top of navigation queue. In other words - show contents of the node.

        Take special care to revert ALL changes made at this step in .navigateFrom.

        See Also:
        .navigateFrom

      • navigateFrom

        public void navigateFrom(@NotNull
                         A activity,
                         @NotNull
                         java.lang.Object data)

        Called when this node is becoming inactive. In other words - contents of the node should be hidden.

        You should revert all changes made in .navigateTo

        See Also:
        .navigateTo

      • interceptBackNavigation

        public boolean interceptBackNavigation(@NotNull
                                       A activity)
        Returns:
        true if this node intercepts .navigateBack event and therefore event should be cancelled. false if this node does not intercept .navigateBack and therefore back navigation will be performed.

      • canHandleNavigationEvent

        public boolean canHandleNavigationEvent(@NotNull
                                        java.lang.Object event)
        Returns:
        true if this node is capable of handling given navigation event. false if this node can't handle this event and it therefore should be passed further.

      • isActionNode

        public boolean isActionNode()
        Returns:
        true if this node should remain in navigation history (i.e. should be restored during NodeNavigator.bind or be reachable by NodeNavigator.navigateBack). false if node is fire-and-forget.
